task.title: Oh, My Oatmeal!
task.shortdesc: This recipe is for oatmeal, which is a hot breakfast made from oats.

taskbody.prereq:
Playful Porridge
You will need the following ingredients:
1 tablespoon of unsalted butter
1 large pinch kosher salt
1 Â½ cups of water
1 cup of quick-cooking oats
1 orange or lemon
1 handful fresh or dried fruit
brown sugar
milk
1 handful of nuts
taskbody.context: This recipe is adapted from the Food Network cookbook How to Boil Water: Life Beyond Takeout.

step.cmd: Combine the butter, salt, and water in a small saucepan and bring to a boil
Finely grate the citrus zest into the pan
Bring to a boil again, reduce to a simmer, and stir in fruit
Stir constantly until oats are cooked and dried fruit is slightly plumped for 2 minutes
Divide into 2 bowls and sprinkle with sweetener of your choice
Drizzle with non-dairy milk and top off with nuts
